title: 求1.9+的playsound指令教程
author: Empty丶夜空
txt_content: 之前一直玩的是1.7的，最近突然想玩1.9了，但突然发现playsound不一样了，有没有什么办法找到声音文件？

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content: 1.9的playsound有变，声音id也有变化，大部分变成了block.xxx或entity.xxx等，按tab键可以显示，同时音效id后面要加声源，一般都是voice，也可以按tab查找

replies.author: trestle
replies.txt_content:
官方wiki
playsound
https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/命令#playsoundstopsound
https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/命令#stopsound声音大全
http://www.theredengineer.com/1.9-playsound-list.html
http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding-java-edition/mapping-and-modding-tutorials/1571574-all-minecraft-playsound-file-names
